title: Mosaic: DeFi Functionality for NFTs
description: It is exceedingly difficult to price, monetize and leverage expensive NFTs. There is no service offering adequate options for NFT collectors
solution: Focused on product and UX, Mosaic offers NFT collectors the chance to fractionalize, collateralize, trade, pool, govern, and flex their NFTs
experience: We are a collection of NFT creators, developers and collectors partnering with top blockchain developers and traditional financial experts.
